Localization.Name: Apocalypse Arms
Localization.Description: Apocalypse Arms produces aggressive, devastating weapons inspired by Messer-Era technology.

English.Name: Apocalypse Arms
English.Description: Apocalypse Arms produces aggressive, devastating weapons inspired by Messer-Era technology.

Localization.Name: Scourge Railgun
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Railgun
Class: Ballistic

Magazine Size: 5
Rate Of Fire: 60 rpm
Effective Range: 200 m

Attachments: Optics (N/A), Barrel (N/A), Underbarrel (S4)

Equally devastating to larger threats and hostile vehicles, this shoulder mounted railgun from Apocalypse Arms uses electromagnets to deliver its payload accurately over great distances, making it the Scourge of land, air and space.

Localization.Name: Scourge Railgun Magazine (5 cap)
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Magazine
Capacity: 5

This magazine holds the large specially designed .937 caliber tungsten sabot rounds fired by the Apocalypse Arms Scourge railgun.
